resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
cc [~Jayjeet]
ARROW-13607 enabled privileged mode for ubuntu-cpp docker builds, which prevents usage of userns remapping. We should disable privileged mode.

Privilege mode was required to mount cephfs, which, according to the Fuse docs here: https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/cephfs/mount-using-fuse/, should be possible as non-root.
fields.summary: [CI] Disable privileged mode for Docker runs

comments.body: Hi [~jeszyb], thanks for reporting this issue. I will try to fix this soon.
Hi [~jeszyb], I have raised a PR fixing this. Can you please review ? Thanks.
